scaleImageMap

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage scaleImageMap(java.awt.image.BufferedImage fullResImage,
                                                  int imageType)
Scales the image map based on current window size - maintains aspect ratio of map, returns correctly scaled image. Also auto sets the imagemap lable the current scale size. Also scales for appropriate zoom level and center.

Parameters:
fullResImage - Input image that is full res.
imageType - image type
Returns:
image scaled appropriatly
